description:
Bible.is offers mobile access to Scripture in more languages than any other Bible App, and includes dramatized Bible Audio and The JESUS Film Project.  READ the Bible, LISTEN to the Bible, and SEE the Bible as never before with anyone in the world. 

- FREE Holy Bible, sharing the word of God in over 800+ languages. 
- Search Bibles by language or by country.
- Choose your display language: Arabic, Chinese, English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Vietnamese, Farsi / Persian, Dutch, Hebrew, Indonesian, Italian, Korean, Thai. and many more…
- Download text and audio Bibles for offline reading and listening anytime, anywhere. 
- Search for keywords, book names, and specific verses. 
- Bookmark, highlight, and add notes. You’re one tap away from simple Bible study tools. 
- Watch Bible Video! See God’s Word come to life in 61 video segments from The JESUS Film Project. Available in hundreds of languages with new languages added regularly. 
- Share any Bible verse via Facebook, Twitter, SMS, Email, or Copy in just a tap. 
- Stay in sync. With a free Bible.is Account, access bookmarks, highlights, and notes on Bible.is Online (www.bible.is) and your other devices. 

Localized Bibles based on your device language: Arabic, Chinese , English, French, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, Russian and more... 

BIBLE.IS LANGUAGES 

Here are a 'few' of the Bibles available:
Arabic, Asháninka, Bafut, Bulgarian, Cebuano, Chinese Mandarin, Chinese, Cantonese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Ewe, Farsi / Persian, Finnish, French, German, Guaymi, Haitian, Huasteco Veracruz, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Korean, Latin, Malagasy, Mezquital, Ngiemboon, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Somali, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese, ...many more! 

A MINISTRY OF FAITH COME BY HEARING 

Bible.is, a ministry of Faith Comes By Hearing (FCBH) a 501c(3) non-profit ministry dedicated to reaching the world’s poor and illiterate with the Word of God in Audio. All US donations are fully tax deductible. 

--JOIN THE BIBLE.IS COMMUNITY-- 

Email Support with ideas and concerns from within your Bible.is App orsupport@bible.is. 
Join our growing international community on Facebook:www.Facebook.com/Bibleis. 
Follow us for daily scripture on Twitter: www.twitter.com/Bibleis. 
Access more resources at Bible.is Online: http://bible.is.
releaseNotes:
FIXED Rare crash during long audio sessions that may result in device reset

-----New in 2.6-----

NEW Sleep timer
NEW Night theme
NEW Control Center - Swipe down in the Bible view to access controls for text size, font, day/night themes, and sleep timer
NEW Download Options - easily download text and audio for offline use without having to leave the Bible view.
NEW Custom fonts to display special characters for certain languages
Other miscellaneous bug fixes and other enhancements
